name: twelve

A1 the number 12: The cafeteria opens for lunch at twelve (o'clock). a twelve-seater minibus See also
dozen
More examplesFewer examplesI'm catering for twelve on Sunday, all the family are coming.Our office floor space measured twelve metres by ten.Hotel guests are requested to vacate their rooms by twelve noon.The competition is open to children between six and twelve years of age.We need a deposit of £165 followed by twelve monthly payments of £60.

12: Casey is twelve. a twelve-volume set
Twelve can also mean twelve o’clock.
